sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-message-dialog', templateUrl: './message-dialog.component.html', }) export class MessageDialogComponent { messageData = { name: '', email: '', message: '', }; constructor( private dialogRef: MatDialogRef, private http: HttpClient ) {} onSubmit(): void { // Replace with your backend API endpoint const apiUrl = 'https://your-backend-url.com/api/messages'; this.http.post(apiUrl, this.messageData).subscribe( () => { alert('Message sent successfully!'); this.dialogRef.close(); }, (error) => { console.error('Error sending message:', error); alert('Failed to send the message. Please try again.'); } ); } }
